memberdef.name: InnerTLS
memberdef.initializer: EXTERN STATIC constexpr MakeStrTLS(tls, VAR, INIT_STR) \ EXTERN STATIC util::tls::TLCLS<TYPE, StrTLS(tls,VAR) INIT> TagTLS(VAR);

memberdef.name: DeclareStInitImplTLS
memberdef.initializer: InnerTLS(tlcls, type, var, InitTempTLS(init), InitStrTLS(var), , static)

memberdef.name: InnerClsInTLS
memberdef.initializer: static DeclareMakeStrTLS(tls, VAR); \ static util::tls::TLCLS<TYPE, StrTLS(tls,VAR) INIT> TagTLS(VAR);

memberdef.name: InnerClsOutTLS
memberdef.initializer: DeclareMakeStrClsTLS(CLS, tls, VAR, INIT_STR) \ util::tls::TLCLS<TYPE, CLS::StrTLS(tls,VAR) INIT> CLS::TagTLS(VAR);

memberdef.name: DeclareClsInInitImplTLS
memberdef.initializer: InnerClsInTLS(tlcls, cls, type, var, InitTempTLS(init), InitStrTLS(var))

memberdef.name: DeclareClsOutInitImplTLS
memberdef.initializer: InnerClsOutTLS(tlcls, cls, type, var, InitTempTLS(init), InitStrTLS(var))
